attributes.action: allow for and against on all petitions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i propose that all petitions should have a for and against or agree dissagree box for all those interested in the subject. ie legalise the use of canabis. why should i only be able to sign if i agree. i would like to dissagree. or maybe a for against or even debate. there are many petitions that i completely dissagree with but certain people viewing this site may see a add in there guns are us webiste legalising guns on the streets and there will be lots of drug dealers and criminals who will gladly log on just to sign and may even get 10,000 signs but the rest of our country may wish to countersign with no option. i would actually like this petition to be on all subjects if it is possible.

rejection.details: You may a create a petition requesting an alternative action, including action that is the direct opposite of an existing petition.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
